description: YubiKey Manager - configure YubiKeys. If there are multiple YubiKeys connected, you have to add --device serial_number before a subcommand. More information: https://docs.yubico.com/software/yubikey/tools/ykman/index.html.

useCases.description: Display general information about a YubiKey (serial number, firmware version, capabilities, etc.):
List connected YubiKeys with short, one-line descriptions (including the serial number):
View documentation for enabling and disabling applications:
View documentation for managing the FIDO applications:
View documentation for managing the OATH application:
View documentation for managing the OpenPGP application:
